item.title: Bitcoin Price Tell Me You'll Be True
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Tell Me You'll Be True

Bitcoin price is climbing in a choppy advance. Is this the base of a large advance, or just an upward correction in a sideways spell? This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here. Not a member? Join now.

item.title: Is BIP 32 Technology Cryptographic Curve Agnostic?
item.description:
Is BIP 32 Technology Cryptographic Curve Agnostic?

Does BIP 32 always implicitly assume secp256k1 elliptic curve cryptography (ECC) is to be applied, or can BIP 32 technology also be applied to create extended public or private keys that can readil...

Industry Report: Banks Trying to Beat Bitcoin - Bitcoinist.net
item.description:
Industry Report: Banks Trying to Beat Bitcoin - Bitcoinist.net

Banks create the ultimate Bitcoin rival, Bitwala launches a new wallet, and Poloniex de-lists over 20 altcoins. Want to catch up on the latest digital currency news? Check out the stories below.

item.title: Bitmain's New Miner to Bring Bitcoin Mining Back to Homes
item.description:
Bitmain's New Miner to Bring Bitcoin Mining Back to Homes

Beijing based Bitmain Technologies Limited, owner of Antminer series of Bitcoin miners, Hashnest, Antpool and BTC.com will next week launch what it claims to be the world's most silent multi-terahash Bitcoin miner, and a silent 2600W PSU specially designed for high performance mining. This model is called the ' Antminer R4 '.

item.title: Bitcoin Confiscated in €1 Million Finnish Drug Bust - CoinDesk
item.description:
Bitcoin Confiscated in €1 Million Finnish Drug Bust - CoinDesk

Customs agents in Finland revealed today that they seized bitcoin and other items worth about €1m earlier this year in connection with the operation of online dark market. In addition to the bitcoin and other "movable property", the Finnish customs agency said it stopped about 15 kilos of drugs totaling 10 million doses and valued on the street at about € 1.1m, according to a statement.

item.title: Baidu's Slap of Bitcoin with a Ban Is a Wake up Call to All
item.description:
Baidu's Slap of Bitcoin with a Ban Is a Wake up Call to All

News has come in this morning that Baidu has banned bitcoin advertising on its website which handles almost all of China's search inquiries. The action follows the tragic death of Wei Zexi, a college student with cancer who sought treatment from a hospital found through an online advertisement.

item.title: What Ethereum's Fork Means for Bitcoin's Block Size Debate - CoinDesk
item.description:
What Ethereum's Fork Means for Bitcoin's Block Size Debate - CoinDesk

Could a development on the ethereum blockchain help resolve one of bitcoin's longest-running debates? It may not seem like an obvious question given the differences between the two blockchain networks. After all, bitcoin aims to provide an uncensorable digital currency, while ethereum seeks to serve as a platform for decentralized applications.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; The Week's Final Take - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; The Week's Final Take - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this evening. So the weekend has pretty much arrived, but we've still got the close of the US session ahead of us, and an evening's worth of trading to see if we can close out the week on top of the market.
